Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: He imana vali'o! Inham inakari'am nala lara'i karo, jihare tuhade asa pasa hana ate cahida hai ki uha tuhade adara kathorata nu mahisusa karana ate jana la'o ki alaha, raba da bhai'a rakhana vali'am de nala hai

Ate jadom ko'i surata utari jandi hai tam unham vicom kujha loka akhade hana ki isa ne tuhade vicom kisa da visavasa vadha dita. Tam jihare imana vale hana unham da isa ne imana vadha dita ate uha prasana ho ga'e
Ate jinham lokam de dilam vica roga hana tam usa ne unham di gadagi te gadagi paida kara diti. Uha mauta taka inakari hi rahe
Ki iha loka dekhade nahim ki uha hara sala ika jam do vara imatihana vica pa'e jande hana. Phira vi uha na tauba karade hana ate na sikhi'a lainde hana

Ate jadom ko'i surata utari jandi hai tam iha loka ika dusare nu dekhade hana ki inham nu ko'i dekhada tam nahim, phira cala dhrande hana. 'Alaha ne inham de dilam nu isa karana badala dita, ki'unki iha samajha tom kama laina vale loka nahim hana

Tuhade kola ika rasula a'i'a hai, jo khuda tuhade vicom' hai. Tuhada nukasana vica rahina usa la'i dukha hai. Uha tuhadi neki da cahavana hai. Imana vali'am upara bahuta saneha karana vala ate rahimata vala hai
Phira jekara uha muha morana tam kahi di'u ki alaha mere la'i kafi hai. Usa tom`thil'ham (mera) ko'i pujanayoga nahim. Ise ute maim bharosa kita ate uhi malaka hai uce arasam (sighasana) da
